question: Who among the following were awarded Nobel Prize in 1958 for One Gene One Enzyme Concept?
explanation: George W. Beadle (1903-1989) and Edward L. Tatum (1909-1975) show how genes direct the synthesis of enzymes that control metabolic processes. George Beadle and Edward Tatum were awarded Nobel Prize in 1958 for One Gene One Enzyme Concept.
